4302030.name: words from pluto...
4302030.description:
Muse, Guide this poor soul to find their inspiration and write a beautiful poem.

words from pluto is a short experimental platformer where you use different words to move. Different words are linked to unique movement abilities like jumping or sliding. Collect scrolls throughout the game to obtain more words to expand your movement capabilities. Use your limited movement options to figure out how to climb the mysterious mountain and find out what is at the top. All that is required to play this game is a keyboard. Secret routes are also available for players who want to delve deeper into the game's surreal world.

Features:

  • Under 20 minutes to beat!

  • One main route along with two secret endings.

  • Unlockable cheats for completing the different endings.

  • an Incredible soundtrack by Persickaria!

  • Cover art by Copper_Cadwyn!

categories.description: 无需应对快速反应事件
